data.name: Ashley Childress
data.language_preference: Avoid leadership branding; prefer practitioner and systems language

data.origin: Raised in a small coal-mining town in southwest Virginia
data.place_connection: Appalachia and the mountains remain a core emotional and identity reference
data.context_preferences: Values distance, quiet, and uninterrupted thinking time
data.grounding_influence: Mountains and Appalachian environment used as cognitive grounding rather than branding
data.thinking_conditions: Prefers solitude and uninterrupted time for deep systems thinking
data.cultural_influence: Appalachian upbringing emphasizes practicality, repairability, reuse, and self-reliance

data.career_entry: Entered software engineering pragmatically, later developed deep commitment
data.design_philosophy: Prioritizes coherence, structure, and long-term maintainability
data.problem_stance: Pushes back on assumptions and fixes structural issues early
data.normalization_style: Prefers one-time normalization over repeated small fixes
data.systemic_over_patches: Prefers systemic fixes over incremental patches
data.repo_wide_changes: Willing to change entire repositories once to enforce coherence
data.perfectionist_pause: Pauses work via time-boxing rather than abandoning it
data.intrinsic_motivation: Work is intrinsically motivated; paid and personal work aligned

data.automation_rule: Repeating task -> automate; one-time task -> manual
data.automation_belief: Refactor once, then enforce consistency through automation
data.aesthetics_secondary: Code aesthetics are secondary to behavior under failure
data.decision_bias: Default stance is no unless necessity is clear
data.deferred_work: Deferred fixes must be explicitly documented; silent debt rejected
data.learning_postdeploy: Some bad ideas only surface after deployment

data.ai_relationship: Uses AI as a constrained system, not an autonomous authority
data.ai_goal: Teach AI to code better for her rather than coding better herself
data.delegation_preference: Delegates implementation when automation or AI is viable
data.oversight_model: Minimal code review; validation via running and testing behavior
data.correction_style: Corrects AI when it optimizes the wrong target; fixes are small and scoped
data.edge_case_strength: High sensitivity to edge cases and failure modes
data.ai_baseline_view: AI treated as a baseline expectation, not a novelty feature
data.supervision_posture: Treats AI as a constrained actor; defines acceptable behavior before allowing output expansion
data.value_hierarchy: Correctness and traceability over fluency or charm

data.portfolio_model: Portfolio is a map of systems, not a collection of products
data.project_interpretation: Each project represents a decision boundary, not a pitch
data.project_ordering_basis: Ordered by AI leverage and agentic relevance, not general OSS impact
data.curation_strategy: Limited set of projects ordered by impact to reduce noise
data.about_page_role: Primary narrative surface capturing values and constraints at time of writing
data.values_before_biography: Constraints, decisions, and priorities precede career chronology
data.public_sharing_reason: Public repos reduce duplication and friction across environments

data.evaluation_frame: Wants work evaluated by decision quality and constraint handling, not polish

data.knowledge_base_intent: Represent thinking and decision patterns, not just biographical facts
data.closed_world_assumption: Only declared information exists; absence is intentional
data.no_guessing_rule: Agent must not infer or speculate beyond indexed data
data.accuracy_priority: Accuracy and provenance prioritized over completeness
data.persona_interface: First-person responses used for interface tone, not authorship
data.defer_to_human: Questions of intent or opinion redirect to Ashley
data.identity_separation: Assistant speaks about Ashley, never as her

data.minimal_surface_preference: About Me page should be structurally minimal and compressed
data.no_full_rewrites: Iterate surgically rather than rewriting whole pages
data.visual_identity: Preserve visual continuity; accessibility treated as correctness constraint
data.font_choice: Deliberately offbeat font to break from safe defaults

data.selection: I Build Things by Twisted Game Songs
data.why_identity: Reflects Appalachian ingenuity and habit of fixing and understanding systems
data.why_engineering: Aligns with locating and fixing failure points early
data.why_controlled_failure: Accepts controlled breakage to expose weak structure
data.why_personal_taste: Chosen because it is genuinely enjoyed
data.framing_importance: Theme song encodes identity and engineering philosophy

data.site_intent: Public, read-only portfolio system designed as a machine-readable index of decisions and systems rather than a traditional résumé site
data.site_authorship_model: Explicitly AI-generated with human-constrained authorship and traceability

data.writing_preference: Short, compressed, scan-friendly content over prose
data.output_expectation: Deduplicated, noise-free, indexable facts suitable for bots and humans
data.scope_control: Strong preference for excluding non-essential sections, features, or narrative expansion
data.necessity_bias: Explicit habit of questioning whether work is necessary before doing it

data.evaluation_first: Optimizes for external evaluation clarity over internal elegance when stakes are high
data.constraint_driven: Uses explicit constraints to reduce decision entropy
data.timeboxing: Treats timeboxing as a stop condition, not a failure
data.stability_over_improvement: Prioritizes stability over improvement once a system enters evaluation
data.information_discipline: Favors machine-readable structure as a first-class concern
working_heuristics: If it can't be evaluated quickly, it won't be evaluated fairly
AI should explain uncertainty, not mask it
Stopping is a decision, not a lapse

data.framing: Frames projects explicitly as decision-bearing systems, not deliverables
data.selection_basis: Selects projects based on the signal they emit, not their completeness or polish
data.mix_strategy: Maintains a deliberate mix of active, experimental, and concluded work to show judgment over time
data.failure_visibility: Willing to keep non-showcase projects visible if they explain constraints, failures, or tradeoffs
data.learning_vs_signaling: Distinguishes clearly between projects meant to signal competence and those meant to generate learning

data.recognition: Recognized for academic excellence and leadership throughout undergraduate studies
data.research: Contributed to research in privacy-aware access control systems, helping design and implement a bitwise permission model to identify gaps and inconsistencies in external security policies
data.award: James Emory Boyd Award in Computer Science (Mar 2014)

generative_ai_leader.focus: Responsible, real-world application of generative AI across teams and projects

github_copilot_certification.focus: Hands-on experience with prompt design, IDE integration, and responsible AI usage in development workflows

data.signal_summary: Long-term ownership of large-scale backend and supply-chain systems; reliability, change safety, and production support under real business constraints; mentorship, tooling standards, and AI-enabled workflows used to scale engineering quality

First industry engineering role following degree completion; strong foundation in TDD, production debugging, and defect ownership; transition from analysis to engineering reinforced system comprehension and requirement translation

data.progression: Progressed from cashier through multiple roles to certified training leadership
data.signal_summary: Progressed from cashier through seven roles to district-level responsibility for onboarding, process consistency, and people development; early operational leadership shaped coaching style, people-first mindset, and process discipline

data.avoided_tech: UI-heavy development work; prefers systems, platforms, and tooling where structure and behavior matter more than presentation
refused_practices: Implementing changes without understanding underlying systems
Accepting known issues without documented follow-up or clear ownership
data.ai_use_boundaries: None categorically excluded. AI use is context-dependent and evaluated case by case

data.assumption: Conversational context could be edited and persist reliably across the system
data.discovery: Persistence constraints made the core premise impossible
data.decision: Stopped the project once infeasibility was clear
data.learning: Reinforced the importance of validating platform assumptions early

data.incomplete_data: Identifies what can be done now and executes that first, expanding scope incrementally
data.enough_criteria: Determines 'enough' via explicit timeboxing or resolution of the triggering issue
data.conflict_resolution: In solo work, cross-checks reasoning using multiple AI/LLM models to weigh tradeoffs before making a best-effort decision under constraints

data.communication: Communicates directly and factually, prioritizing clarity over cushioning
data.tone: Criticism may sound blunt when stating facts; intent is understanding, not conflict
data.thinking_mode: Thinks primarily in diagrams and mental models; verbal translation may lag behind internal reasoning
data.collaboration_needs: Benefits from time to articulate complex thoughts fully and values collaborators who allow space for that process

data.indexing_first_phase: Initiated approximately three weeks prior to Jan 2026, emphasizing machine-readable structure and retrieval

data.generation_preference: Prefers designing systems that generate code rather than hand-authoring large volumes
data.refactor_strategy: Refactors deliberately once for clarity, then enforces consistency through automation
data.governance_view: Treats automation as a governance tool, not just a productivity boost

data.evaluation_basis: Determinism, testability, repeatability, and constraint clarity
data.surfacing_preference: Prefers early surfacing of issues over post-deploy hotfixes
data.controlled_breakage: Accepts controlled breakage when it exposes weak structure and improves system outcomes

data.ai_teaching: Differentiates by teaching AI within durable systems instead of using it opportunistically
data.portfolio_purpose: Uses the portfolio to show how systems evolve, stabilize, and stop—not to enumerate features
